name: Police Car Driving Master
description:
Police Car Driving Master is a free police car driving game where you have to drive your police car city traffic rush driving on the respective city without damaging to traffic and other road obstacles in a way of your driving.

Police Car Driving Master is a free driving game for stunt adventure lovers. If you are parking car seeker training and looking for extreme drive police city car driving then clutch our most addictive furious police car driving city racer game today to learn extreme police car city driver 3D simulation on your device.

Features:
- Realistic driving experience
- Police siren
- Endless traffic city
- Realistic 3D police car
- View from cockpit of the police car
- Realistic sound environment
- Beautiful high quality FULL HD graphics
